short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically sanitize and copy selected text

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CleanCopify: Smart Copy & Paste Perfect

Transform your copy-paste experience with CleanCopify - the intelligent text formatting assistant that automatically cleans and standardizes your text as you paste. Perfect for professionals, writers, and anyone who works with text across different platforms.

KEY FEATURES:
- Instant Text Sanitization - Remove unwanted formatting with one click
- Smart Paste - Automatically clean text while pasting
- Customizable Formatting Rules - Create text transformation presets
- Context Menu Integration - Quick access anywhere on the web
- Privacy-First Design - All processing happens locally in your browser

PERFECT FOR:
- Emails & Documents
- Code Snippets
- Spreadsheet Data
- Professional Communications
- Content Creation
- Data Entry

WHY CHOOSE CLEANCOPIFY:
- Save hours of manual formatting time
- Eliminate formatting inconsistencies
- Maintain clean, professional documents
- Work faster and more efficiently
- Zero learning curve - intuitive interface
- Customizable to your specific needs

SECURITY & PRIVACY:
- 100% secure local processing
- No data collection or storage
- Works offline
- No external server connections

USE CASES:
- Clean up messy formatted text from emails
- Standardize content copied from various sources
- Remove unwanted line breaks and spacing
- Format code snippets consistently
- Sanitize spreadsheet data instantly

Supercharge your text editing workflow with CleanCopify - where clean formatting meets efficiency.
